name: part_010
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】重大告知あり！＂アニソン Night Fever!!＂【#角巻わため生誕祭2025】 [rhgRzAgYKDM]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_010.mov

scenes.description: MC section: Tsunomaki Watame talks about using a face roller and announces her new song 'Biri'.

subtitles.original: はーい！ありがとうございました！感謝です！
subtitles.english: Hi! Thank you so much! I'm grateful!

subtitles.original: あ、そういえば、ころころ、ころころ、みんな気づいたかな？
subtitles.english: Ah, by the way, did everyone notice the rolling?

subtitles.original: ころころ最初から実はそうだったんだけど、あの小顔ローラーがんばりまして
subtitles.english:
I've actually been doing it since the beginning,
but I worked hard with that face roller.

subtitles.original: 実はわため、小顔になったんですよね、こう見えて
subtitles.english: Believe it or not, Watame's face actually got smaller.

subtitles.original: もうあれだね、顔デカって言われなくなっちゃうな、みんなめんごめんご
subtitles.english:
Now I won't be called "big face" anymore.
Sorry about that, everyone!

subtitles.original: そんな変わってないって、言わない！言わない！
subtitles.english: Don't say it hasn't changed! Don't! Don't!

subtitles.original: ちゃんとちっちゃくなったんだ！
subtitles.english: It definitely got smaller!

subtitles.original: あ、このあとね、メン限3Dライブも10時15分からわためチャンネルでやりますので
subtitles.english:
Ah, after this, I'll be doing a membership-only
3D live on the Watame Channel from 10:15 PM.

subtitles.original: 他の衣装のね、この小顔のわためも見てほしいなと思います
subtitles.english:
So I'd like you to see this small-faced Watame
in other outfits too.

subtitles.original: 歌って踊りますんで、ぜひ10時15分メンバーシップに入ってお待ちください
subtitles.english:
I'll be singing and dancing, so please join
the membership and wait for 10:15 PM.

subtitles.original: でも！まだライブも終わりではありません！ここで告知があります！
subtitles.english:
But! The live show isn't over yet!
I have an announcement to make!

subtitles.original: 角巻わための新曲...「ビリ」、なんと発表いたします！
subtitles.english:
Tsunomaki Watame's new song... "Biri"!
I'm announcing it now!

subtitles.original: このあと10時からMVが投稿されて、で、楽曲配信が24時から始まります！
subtitles.english:
The MV will be posted at 10 PM, and the
digital release starts at midnight!

subtitles.original: よろしくお願いします！
subtitles.english: Please look forward to it!

subtitles.original: 神田ジョンさん、篠崎あやとさん、DECO*27さんという布陣で作った
subtitles.english:
It was made by a team consisting of
Kanda John, Ayato Shinozaki, and DECO*27.

subtitles.original: わための新しく、あたらしい部分だったりとか、まあちょっとあんまり歌ったことないような感じの曲になっているかなと思っているので
subtitles.english:
I think it shows a new side of Watame, and it's a type
of song I haven't really sung much before.

subtitles.original: ぜひ楽しみにしててください！あ、でも！
subtitles.english: So please look forward to it! Oh, but...!

subtitles.original: あ、でもこのあと、まだ一曲ぐらいをやる時間があるか...
subtitles.english:
Oh, but wait, there's still time for about
one more song after this...

subtitles.original: はあ、はあ、じゃあ、ビリやろうか！
subtitles.english: Yeah, yeah... then shall we do "Biri"?

subtitles.original: えー、あと一曲、ビリ、新曲。ぜひみんなに聴いていただきたいなと思うので
subtitles.english:
Well, one last song. "Biri", the new song.
I'd really like everyone to hear it.

subtitles.original: 最後まで、あのダンスも可愛いんで、ちょっと一生懸命踊ります。見てください！
subtitles.english:
Until the end... the dance is cute too, so I'll
do my best. Please watch!

subtitles.original: では、最後の曲、聴いてください。ビリ。
subtitles.english: Well then, please listen to the final song: "Biri".

subtitles.original: 三度毎度でグダダダダ
subtitles.english: Another flop, every single time

subtitles.original: もうハイローガチャでぐちゃぐちゃ
subtitles.english: Messy high-low gacha games

subtitles.original: 同情少年ポジグダダダ
subtitles.english: Sympathy seeking, a sloppy position

subtitles.original: 毎回歌うわなんてこったい感
subtitles.english: I sing it every time, feeling like "good grief"

subtitles.original: 三度やるだけやるしかない
subtitles.english: Might as well just do it one more time

subtitles.original: もう小さいことで凹んでらんないわ
subtitles.english: Can't be getting depressed over the small stuff anymore

subtitles.original: 全うするまで育つだけさ
subtitles.english: Just gotta grow until I see it through

subtitles.original: 心配いらずのジェットコースター
subtitles.english: A worry-free roller coaster

subtitles.original: 研ぎ上げた五感で
subtitles.english: With my senses sharpened

subtitles.original: おめかしさぞかしハッピーでいっぱい
subtitles.english: Dressed up and surely full of happiness

subtitles.original: 描き込んだ願いが
subtitles.english: The wishes I've sketched in

subtitles.original: 香り立つ今僕になるんだ
subtitles.english: Will become me now, fragrant and blooming

subtitles.original: 僕しかできないこと
subtitles.english: The things only I can do

subtitles.original: 認めてほしいの
subtitles.english: I want you to acknowledge them

subtitles.original: 「どうせ」とか思ってらんないわ
subtitles.english: I can't keep thinking "well, whatever"

subtitles.original: 妄言ばこん！切り刻んでいこう
subtitles.english: Nonsense, pow! Let's slice it all up

subtitles.original: まだ一等賞まで放電がありそう
subtitles.english: Seems like there's still a spark left for first place

subtitles.original: 当選しちゃうかは挑戦次第
subtitles.english: Whether I win or not depends on the challenge

subtitles.original: やるかやらないかだ
subtitles.english: It's about whether you do it or not

subtitles.original: 「はぁめんどっぽい」これでエンドっぽい
subtitles.english: "Ugh, what a pain." Seems like this is the end

subtitles.original: 叩き潰した弱音がちょー痛い
subtitles.english: The complaints I crushed are super painful

subtitles.original: 夢が叶っちゃって甘くなれ
subtitles.english: My dreams came true, so get soft

subtitles.original: 黙れ！判定はノーノーノー グッバイ
subtitles.english: Shut up! The verdict is no-no-no, goodbye

subtitles.original: 三度やるだけやるだけバッド
subtitles.english: One more time, just doing it is bad enough

subtitles.original: もう涙腺アミダ全泣きが確定
subtitles.english: My tear ducts are a lottery, crying is guaranteed

subtitles.original: 同情求めてはわわわわわ
subtitles.english: Seeking sympathy, hawawawa

subtitles.original: ねえちゃんと抱きしめて
subtitles.english: Hey, hold me tight

subtitles.original: 顔出した絶望で
subtitles.english: With the despair that peeked out

subtitles.original: ごまかし乗る歌詞ハッピーが足んない
subtitles.english: Lyrics riding on deception, not enough happiness

subtitles.original: あたしを愛せない
subtitles.english: I can't love myself

subtitles.original: 比べたら比べるだけ負け犬（ルーザー）
subtitles.english: If I compare, I'm just a loser the more I do

subtitles.original: ありなし選べちゃうけど
subtitles.english: I can choose between "yes" or "no"

subtitles.original: 弱気になるかも
subtitles.english: But I might get cold feet

subtitles.original: 「どうせ無理」思って仕舞っちゃうわ
subtitles.english: I'll end up thinking "it's impossible anyway"

subtitles.original: 有言だもん！叶わないもん
subtitles.english: Because I said it! Because it won't come true

subtitles.original: また一等賞指くわえて見てるの
subtitles.english: Watching first place again with envy

subtitles.original: あたしじゃない誰かだったの
subtitles.english: It was someone who isn't me

subtitles.original: ノーノー誰か代わってよ
subtitles.english: No, no, someone trade places with me

subtitles.original: せーので間違いの未来
subtitles.english: One, two, a mistaken future

subtitles.original: 前進もっとハイになって
subtitles.english: Moving forward, get even higher

subtitles.original: 贅沢夢見ていたい
subtitles.english: I want to keep dreaming big
